attributes.action: support the opposition to plans to build a 1,000-megawatt power station in Cresswell
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Villagers Voice Staffordshire Moorlands is a protest group of people opposed to plans by Blythe Park Power to build a 1,000-megawatt power station in Cresswell, Stoke-on-Trent.
